'''Bird and Blossom Design Fountain''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Bird and Blossom Design Fountain is obtainable from [[Tubby]] for reaching [[Trust Rank]] 9.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|White Iron Chunk = 12
|Iron Chunk = 12
|sort = White Iron Chunk,Iron Chunk
}}
